title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.2 - Other laws, codes, rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.2 - Other laws, codes, rules and regulations

State Regulations

Medical facilities issued operating certificates or
certificates of approval shall comply with all pertinent Federal laws and
regulations enacted pursuant thereto, applicable State law, including the

Public Health Law and the Mental Hygiene Law and codes, rules and regulations
having general application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
400.2

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
